name: reclining
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) leaning or lying back with the upper part of the body in a nearly horizontal position: The figure in the painting is in a reclining pose.
(of a chair) able to be moved so that the back is in a nearly horizontal position: The bus has air conditioning and reclining seats. See
recline
